medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 months prior to presentation. The patient experienced a dry cough and exertional dyspnea, with multiple lung nodules and faint infiltrative opacities appearing on chest radiographs taken during follow-up.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of resection of a synovial sarcoma in the right shoulder 7 years ago and subsequent chemotherapy.
